summary: "Documentary Filmmaker looking for suicidal individual to follow from first preparation to final act." Cut from 142 video tapes, this project sheds light on the tragedy following the infamous Internet ad.
cast: G.J. Echternkamp|Matthew Tilley|Valerie Hurt|Michael Traynor|Konima Parkinson-Jones|Shelley Isaacs|Thomas Moses|Talmadge Ragan|Pamela Salem|Doris Jung Usui
keywords: documentary filmmaker|suicidal|found footage|shot to death|shot in the head
title: Una muerte necesaria
